title: Welcome to Odin
titleText:
Odin is a web application that encompasses your end-to-end business change management process. A user (technical lead, developer, engineer, architect or project lead etc) can create a submission within this tool and complete all required change management obligations (e.g., privacy, data, legal, security).

The tool also supports advanced capabilities including a digital security risk assessment, security control catalogue, control validation audit, and certification and accreditation.

Below are some pre-configured deliverable types that will align to most organisations. Please select one of the options below to create a submission and test the tool.
